member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext
member.summary: An IL manipulation "context" with various helpers and direct access to the MethodBody.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Manipulator
member.summary: The manipulator callback, accepted by the Invoke method.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Method
member.summary: The manipulated method.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.IL
member.summary: The manipulated method's IL processor.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Body
member.summary: The manipulated method body.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Module
member.summary: The manipulated method's module.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Instrs
member.summary: The manipulated method instructions.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Labels
member.summary: A readonly list of all defined labels.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Has the context been made read-only? No further method access is possible, but the context has not yet been disposed.

member.name: E:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.OnDispose
member.summary: Events which run when the context will be disposed.

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.ReferenceBag
member.summary: The current reference bag. Used for methods such as EmitReference and EmitDelegate.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Invoke(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Manipulator)
member.summary: Invoke a given manipulator callback.
member.param: The manipulator to run in this context.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.MakeReadOnly
member.summary: Mark this ILContext as read-only and prevent this context from further accessing the originally passed method.
member.remarks: If the method is altered prior to calling MakeReadOnly or afterwards by accessing the method directly, the results are undefined.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Import(System.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.summary: See

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Import(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: See

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Import(System.Type)
member.summary: See

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.DefineLabel
member.summary: Define a new label to be marked with a cursor.
member.returns: A label without a target instruction.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.DefineLabel(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Define a new label pointing at a given instruction.
member.param: The instruction the label will point at.
member.returns: A label pointing at the given instruction.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.IndexOf(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Determine the index of a given instruction.
member.param: The instruction to get the index of.
member.returns: The instruction index, or the end of the method body if it hasn't been found.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.GetIncomingLabels(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Obtain all labels pointing at the given instruction.
member.param: The instruction to get all labels for.
member.returns: All labels targeting the given instruction.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.AddReference``1(``0)
member.summary: Bind an arbitary object to an ILContext for static retrieval.
member.typeparam: The type of the object. The combination of typeparam and id provides the unique static reference.
member.returns: The id to use in combination with the typeparam for object retrieval.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose this context, making it read-only and invoking all OnDispose event listeners.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILContext.ToString
member.summary: Obtain a string representation of this context (method ID and body).
member.returns: A string representation of this context.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.MoveType
member.summary: Specifies where a ILCursor should be positioned in relation to the target of a search function

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.MoveType.Before
member.summary: Move the cursor before the first instruction in the match

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.MoveType.AfterLabel
member.summary: Equivalent to Before with `cursor.MoveAfterLabels()` causing emitted instructions to become the target of incoming labels

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.MoveType.After
member.summary: Move the cursor after the last instruction in the match

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.SearchTarget
member.summary:
Indicates whether the position of a ILCursor is the result of a search function and if the next search should ignore the instruction preceeding or following this cursor.
SearchTarget.Next is the result of searching with MoveType.Before, and SearchTarget.Prev from MoveType.After

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.SearchTarget.Next
member.summary: A foward searching function cannot match the Next instruction and must move the cursor forward

member.name: F:MonoMod.Cil.SearchTarget.Prev
member.summary: A reverse searching function cannot match the Next instruction and must move the cursor backward

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor
member.summary: A cursor used to manipulate a method body in an ILContext.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Context
member.summary: The context to which this cursor belongs to.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Next
member.summary: The instruction immediately following the cursor position or null if the cursor is at the end of the instruction list.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Prev
member.summary: The instruction immediately preceding the cursor position or null if the cursor is at the start of the instruction list.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Previous
member.summary: The instruction immediately preceding the cursor position or null if the cursor is at the start of the instruction list.

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Index
member.summary: The index of the instruction immediately following the cursor position. Range: 0 to Instrs.Count Setter accepts negative indexing by adding Instrs.Count to the operand

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.SearchTarget
member.summary:
Indicates whether the position of a MMILCursor is the result of a search function and if the next search should ignore the instruction preceeding or following this cursor.
See

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.IncomingLabels
member.summary: Enumerates all labels which point to the current instruction (label.Target == Next)

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Method
member.summary: See

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.IL
member.summary: See

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Body
member.summary: See

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Module
member.summary: See

member.name: P:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Instrs
member.summary: See

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Clone
member.summary: Create a clone of this cursor.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.IsBefore(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Is this cursor before the given instruction?
member.returns: True if this cursor is before the given instruction, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.IsAfter(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Is this cursor after the given instruction?
member.returns: True if this cursor is after the given instruction, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.ToString
member.summary: Obtain a string representation of this cursor (method ID, index, search target, surrounding instructions).
member.returns: A string representation of this cursor.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Goto(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Move the cursor to a target instruction. All other movements go through this.
member.param: Where to move in relation to the target instruction and incoming labels (branches)
Whether to set the `SearchTarget` and skip the target instruction with the next search function

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.MoveAfterLabels
member.summary: Move the cursor after incoming labels (branches). If an instruction is emitted, all labels which currently point to Next, will point to the newly emitted instruction.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.MoveBeforeLabels
member.summary: Move the cursor before incoming labels (branches). This is the default behaviour. Emitted instructions will not cause labels to change targets.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.Goto(System.Int32,MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Move the cursor to a target index. Supports negative indexing. See

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.GotoLabel(MonoMod.Cil.ILLabel,MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Overload for Goto(label.Target). defaults to MoveType.AfterLabel

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.GotoNext(MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search forward and moves the cursor to the next sequence of instructions matching the corresponding predicates. See also

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.TryGotoNext(MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search forward and moves the cursor to the next sequence of instructions matching the corresponding predicates.
member.returns: True if a match was found

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.GotoPrev(MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search backward and moves the cursor to the next sequence of instructions matching the corresponding predicates. See also

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.TryGotoPrev(MonoMod.Cil.MoveType,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search backward and moves the cursor to the next sequence of instructions matching the corresponding predicates.
member.returns: True if a match was found

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.FindNext(MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor[]@,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Find the next occurences of a series of instructions matching the given set of predicates with gaps permitted.
member.param: An array of cursors corresponding to each found instruction (MoveType.Before)

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.TryFindNext(MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor[]@,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Find the next occurences of a series of instructions matching the given set of predicates with gaps permitted.
member.param: An array of cursors corresponding to each found instruction (MoveType.Before)
member.returns: True if a match was found

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.FindPrev(MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor[]@,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search backwards for occurences of a series of instructions matching the given set of predicates with gaps permitted.
member.param: An array of cursors corresponding to each found instruction (MoveType.Before)

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.TryFindPrev(MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor[]@,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary: Search backwards for occurences of a series of instructions matching the given set of predicates with gaps permitted.
member.param: An array of cursors corresponding to each found instruction (MoveType.Before)
member.returns: True if a match was found

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.MarkLabel(MonoMod.Cil.ILLabel)
member.summary: Set the target of a label to the current position (label.Target = Next) and moves after it.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.MarkLabel
member.summary: Create a new label targetting the current position (label.Target = Next) and moves after it.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor.DefineLabel
member.summary: Create a new label for use with
member.returns: A new label with no target

member.summary: Remove several instructions

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.ILCursor._Retarget(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction,MonoMod.Cil.MoveType)
member.summary: Move the cursor and all labels the cursor is positioned after to a target instruction

member.summary: Bind an arbitary object to an ILContext for static retrieval. See

member.summary: Emit the IL to retrieve a stored reference of type with the given and place it on the stack.

member.summary: Store an object in the reference store, and emit the IL to retrieve it and place it on the stack.

member.summary: Emit the IL to invoke a delegate as if it were a method. Stack behaviour matches OpCodes.Call

member.summary: The target instruction this label points at.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.IILReferenceBag
member.summary: An IL inline reference bag used for ILContexts.

member.summary: Get the object for the given ID.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.IILReferenceBag.GetGetter``1
member.summary: Get a MethodInfo for the getter.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.IILReferenceBag.Store``1(``0)
member.summary: Store a new object.
member.returns: An ID to be used for all further operations.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.IILReferenceBag.Clear``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove the object with the given ID from the bag, essentially clearing the ID's slot.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Cil.IILReferenceBag.GetDelegateInvoker``1
member.summary: Get a MethodInfo invoking a delegate of the given type, with the delegate at the top of the stack. Used by .
member.returns: A MethodInfo invoking a delegate of the given type.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.NopILReferenceBag
member.summary: The default IL reference bag. Throws NotSupportedException for every operation.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Cil.RuntimeILReferenceBag
member.summary: An IL reference bag implementation to be used for runtime-generated methods.

member.name: F:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.Mappings
member.summary: Allows you to remap library paths / names and specify loading flags. Useful for cross-platform compatibility. Applies only to DynDll.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.OpenLibrary(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Open a given library and get its handle.
member.param: Whether to skip using the mapping or not.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.TryOpenLibrary(System.String,System.IntPtr@,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Try to open a given library and get its handle.
member.param: The library handle, or null if it failed loading.
Whether to skip using the mapping or not.
member.returns: True if the handle was obtained, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.CloseLibrary(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Release a library handle obtained via OpenLibrary. Don't release the result of OpenLibrary(null)!

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.GetFunction(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Get a function pointer for a function in the given library.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.TryGetFunction(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Get a function pointer for a function in the given library.
member.param: The function pointer, or null if it wasn't found.
member.returns: True if the function pointer was obtained, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.AsDelegate``1(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Extension method wrapping Marshal.GetDelegateForFunctionPointer

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.ResolveDynDllImports(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,MonoMod.Utils.DynDllMapping})
member.summary: Fill all static delegate fields with the DynDllImport attribute. Call this early on in the static constructor.
member.param: The type containing the DynDllImport delegate fields.
Any optional mappings similar to the static mappings.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.DynDll.ResolveDynDllImports(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,MonoMod.Utils.DynDllMapping})
member.summary: Fill all instance delegate fields with the DynDllImport attribute. Call this early on in the constructor.
member.param: An instance of a type containing the DynDllImport delegate fields.
Any optional mappings similar to the static mappings.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Utils.DynDllImportAttribute
member.summary: Similar to DllImport, but requires you to run typeof(DeclaringType).ResolveDynDllImports();

member.name: F:MonoMod.Utils.DynDllMapping.ResolveAs
member.summary: The name as which the library will be resolved as. Useful to remap libraries or to provide full paths.

member.name: F:MonoMod.Utils.DynDllMapping.Flags
member.summary: Platform-dependant loading flags.

member.name: T:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions
member.summary: Collection of extensions used by MonoMod and other projects.

member.summary: Create a hexadecimal string for the given bytes.

member.summary: Invokes all delegates in the invocation list, passing on the result to the next.
member.param: The initial value and first parameter.
Any other arguments that may be passed.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.InvokeWhileTrue(System.MulticastDelegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes all delegates in the invocation list, as long as the previously invoked delegate returns true.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.InvokeWhileFalse(System.MulticastDelegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes all delegates in the invocation list, as long as the previously invoked delegate returns false.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.InvokeWhileNull``1(System.MulticastDelegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes all delegates in the invocation list, as long as the previously invoked delegate returns null.

member.summary: Split PascalCase words to become Pascal Case instead.

member.summary: Write the string to the BinaryWriter in a C-friendly format.
member.param: The output which the method writes to.

member.summary: Cast a delegate from one type to another. Compatible with delegates holding an invocation list (combined delegates).

member.summary: Get a certain custom attribute from an attribute provider.
member.returns: The first matching custom attribute, or null if no matching attribute has been found.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.HasCustomAttribute(Mono.Cecil.ICustomAttributeProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Determine if an attribute provider has got a specific custom attribute.
member.returns: true if the attribute provider contains the given custom attribute, false otherwise.

member.summary: Get the integer value pushed onto the stack with this instruction.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetIntOrNull(Mono.Cecil.Cil.Instruction)
member.summary: Get the integer value pushed onto the stack with this instruction.
member.param: The instruction to get the pushed integer value for.
member.returns: The pushed integer value or null.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.IsBaseMethodCall(Mono.Cecil.Cil.MethodBody,Mono.Cecil.MethodReference)
member.summary: Determine if the method call is a base method call.
member.returns: True if the called method is a base method of the caller method, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.IsCallvirt(Mono.Cecil.MethodReference)
member.summary: Determine if the given method can be preferably called using callvirt.
member.returns: True if the called method can be called using callvirt, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.IsStruct(Mono.Cecil.TypeReference)
member.summary: Determine if the given type is a struct (also known as "value type") or struct-alike (f.e. primitive).
member.returns: True if the type is a struct, primitive or similar, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.ToLongOp(Mono.Cecil.Cil.OpCode)
member.summary: Get the long form opcode for any short form opcode.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.ToShortOp(Mono.Cecil.Cil.OpCode)
member.summary: Get the short form opcode for any long form opcode.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.RecalculateILOffsets(Mono.Cecil.MethodDefinition)
member.summary: Calculate updated instruction offsets. Required for certain manual fixes.
member.param: The method to recalculate the IL instruction offsets for.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.FixShortLongOps(Mono.Cecil.MethodDefinition)
member.summary: Fix (and optimize) any instructions which should use the long / short form opcodes instead.
member.param: The method to apply the fixes to.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.Is(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,Mono.Cecil.MemberReference)
member.summary: Check if the signatures of a given System.Reflection and Mono.Cecil member reference match.
member.returns: True if both references share the same signature, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.Is(Mono.Cecil.MemberReference,System.Reflection.MemberInfo)

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetID(Mono.Cecil.MethodReference,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a reference ID that is similar to the full name, but consistent between System.Reflection and Mono.Cecil.
member.param: The method to get the ID for.
The name to use instead of the reference's own name.
The ID to use instead of the reference's declaring type ID.
Whether the type ID should be included or not. System.Reflection avoids it by default.
Whether the ID should be "simple" (name only).

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetID(Mono.Cecil.CallSite)
member.summary: Get a reference ID that is similar to the full name, but consistent between System.Reflection and Mono.Cecil.
member.param: The call site to get the ID for.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetID(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a reference ID that is similar to the full name, but consistent between System.Reflection and Mono.Cecil.
member.param: The method to get the ID for.
The name to use instead of the reference's own name.
The ID to use instead of the reference's declaring type ID.
Whether the type ID should be included or not. System.Reflection avoids it by default.
Whether the method is regarded as a proxy method or not. Setting this paramater to true will skip the first parameter.
Whether the ID should be "simple" (name only).

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetManagedSize(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the managed size of a given type. This matches an IL-level sizeof(t), even if it cannot be determined normally in C#. Note that sizeof(t) != Marshal.SizeOf(t), f.e. when t is char.
member.param: The type to get the size from.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetThisParamType(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Get a type which matches what the method should receive via ldarg.0
member.param: The method to obtain the "this" parameter type from.

member.name: M:MonoMod.Utils.Extensions.GetLdftnPointer(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Get a native function pointer for a given method. This matches an IL-level ldftn.
member.remarks: ldftn doesn't JIT-compile the method on mono, which thus keeps the class constructor untouched. On the other hand, its result thus doesn't always match that of MethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer().
member.param: The method to get a native function pointer for.
